mapper.select: SELECT config.roomId as roomid, config.roomTypeId as roomtypeid, config.saleName as salename, info.startTime as starttime, info.endTime as endtime, info.fontColor as namefontcolor, type.fontColor as typefontcolor, type.description as typedesc FROM t_room_sale_config config join t_room_sale_config_info info on config.saleroomtypeid = info.id join t_room_sale_type type on info.saletypeid = type.id where config.hotelId = #{hotelId}
SELECT startTime, endTime FROM t_room_sale_config where roomTypeId = #{roomTypeId}
